member.name: T:Utils.ObjectExtensions
member.summary: The ObjectExtensions class provides extension methods for working with objects, including serialization and property checks.
member.remarks: This class includes methods like ToJson for serializing objects to JSON and HasProperties to check if an object has any properties or data.

member.name: M:Utils.ObjectExtensions.ToJson
member.summary: Serializes the given object to a JSON string.
member.param: A flag indicating whether to use indented formatting in the JSON string.
member.returns: A JSON string representation of the object.

member.name: M:Utils.ObjectExtensions.HasProperties
member.summary: Checks if the object has any properties or data.
member.param: The object to check for properties.
member.returns: true if the object has properties or data, otherwise false.
